casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sydney Shakur MERCER 257PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2019 Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Daniel K. Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Sydney Shakur Mercer, for Mercer, Sydney Shakur.

Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General.

Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of March 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of March 2019."

*579Defendant shall have up to and including the 10th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
